2024-12-01.title: December 1st
2024-12-01.message: The snow falls on dragon wings, let's see what today brings.
2024-12-01.task: Write a wallpost about what your character loves about the winter.  When you've done that, write a comment below.

2024-12-02.title: December 2nd
2024-12-02.message: The Jade Mountain Academy hides a lot of secrets, so make sure you don't leave without any regrets...
2024-12-02.task: Today I want you to solve a riddle at The Peacemaker's Riddles. When you've done that, make sure to send a letter to Zeke Damaris telling him you've done the task for December 2nd. Write 'Advent Calendar' as the topic of the letter.

2024-12-03.title: December 3rd
2024-12-03.message: The stars are shining very bright, are you ready for a fight?
2024-12-03.task: Today's assignment is to attend one lesson and do the assignment. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same one as before) and let him know which subject, year, and week you wrote your assignment for.

2024-12-04.title: December 4th
2024-12-04.message: It's important to be nice, because otherwise you might fall on ice.
2024-12-04.task: Write something you like about someone on their wall. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same one as before) and let him know who's wall you wrote on.

2024-12-05.title: December 5th
2024-12-05.message: Remember to cuddle pets shouldn't be hard, unless you want them to run a couple of yards.
2024-12-05.task: Give a pet some love. Find a person who owns a pet and cuddle it. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before) and let him know you cuddled a pet

2024-12-06.title: December 6th
2024-12-06.message: A present is always appreciated, and sometimes it can be sophisticated
2024-12-06.task: Send a gift to someone. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before) and let him know you sent a gift too and what you sent them

2024-12-07.title: December 7th
2024-12-07.message: Somedays don't go as planned, but that we all should understand
2024-12-07.task: Let me know your favorite Wings of Fire character and why.  As always, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before).

2024-12-08.title: December 8th
2024-12-08.message: Writing is something we all treasure; it's a gift beyond all measure.
2024-12-08.task: Write a Christmas poem and post it on your wall. When you've done that, send a letter to Zeke Damaris (use the same letter as before)

2024-12-09.title: December 9th
2024-12-09.message: Du öppnade Lucka 9! Här är din överraskning!
